Merge branch 'master' into testing

* Updated README with GihtHub download link
* Added specific strings (Spanish) not available in the Pro version

* Added support for UTF-8 unicode
* Removed no needed and commented code
* Fixed wrong refresh All when resuming activity

* Added handling of fragment state (position) using savedInstanceState
* Added message when General Info can't be retrieved

* Implemented Search in torrent list
* Added application short name
* Fixed default refresh option to 2 minutes
* Added timeouts values as settings

* Fixed onCreateView issue (blank results, no errors)
* Added 'no torrents found' as a generic message.

* Changed myAdapter to receive torrents' names and data according to current values

* Fixed null pointer crash in torrent's details fragment  when showing toast message and there was not activity

* Changed myAdapter to receive torrents' names and data according to current values

* Fixed null pointer crash in torrent's details fragment  when showing toast message and there was not activity

* Fixed double refresh after goit to Settings or Options, that caused the blank fragment
* Added images to the welcome messahe (about fragment)
